languages.text: {n}Игнорируя неистовствующий в Фесмофориусе огонь, Арджента пристально изучает толпу.{/n} "Все они пришли вкусить чужой боли, а не восславить Его правосудие... Точно свора псов, жаждущая свежую кость".

traits.locale_text: [draft] {n}Игнорируя неистовствующий в Фесмофориусе огонь, Арджента пристально изучает толпу.{/n} "Все они пришли вкусить чужой боли, а не восславить Его правосудие... Точно жалкая свора собак, получившая свежую кость".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ignoring the raging fire within the Phesmophorius, Argenta studies the crowd.{/n} "All of them came here to taste of other people's pain, not to praise His justice... They are as a pack of dogs slavering for a fresh bone."
languages.original_text: {n}Игнорируя неистовствующий в Фесмофориусе огонь, Арджента пристально изучает толпу.{/n} "Все они пришли вкусить чужой боли, а не восславить Его правосудие... Точно свора псов, жаждущая свежую кость".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ignoring the raging fire within the Phesmophorius, Argenta studies the crowd.{/n} "All of them came here to taste of other people's pain, not to praise His justice... They are as a pack of dogs craving a fresh bone."

{n}Ignoring the raging fire within the Phesmophorius, Argenta studies the crowd.{/n} "All of them came here to taste of other people's pain, not to praise His justice... They are as a pack of dogs slavering for a fresh bone."

languages.text: {n}Argenta ignoriert das tobende Feuer in dem Phesmophorius und mustert die Menge.{/n} "Sie alle wollten hier am Schmerz anderer teilhaben, nicht Seine Gerechtigkeit preisen ... Sie sind wie ein Rudel Hunde, das sich um einen frischen Knochen zankt."
languages.original_text: {n}Ignoring the raging fire within the Phesmophorius, Argenta studies the crowd.{/n} "All of them came here to taste of other people's pain, not to praise His justice... They are as a pack of dogs slavering for a fresh bone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta ignoriert das tobende Feuer in dem Phesmophorius und mustert die Menge.{/n} "Sie alle wollten hier am Schmerz anderer teilhaben, nicht Seine Gerechtigkeit preisen ... Sie sind wie ein Rudel Hunde, das sich um einen frischen Knochen zankt."

languages.text: {n}Ignorant le feu qui fait rage dans le Phesmophorius, Argenta scrute la foule.{/n} « Ils sont ici pour se repaître de la douleur d'autrui, et non pas pour rendre grâce à Sa justice... Ils sont semblables à une meute de chiens bavant devant un os à ronger. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ignoring the raging fire within the Phesmophorius, Argenta studies the crowd.{/n} "All of them came here to taste of other people's pain, not to praise His justice... They are as a pack of dogs slavering for a fresh bone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ignorant le feu qui fait rage dans le Phesmophorius, Argenta scrute la foule.{/n} « Ils sont ici pour se repaître de la douleur d'autrui, et non pas pour rendre grâce à Sa justice... Ils sont semblables à une meute de chiens bavant devant un os à ronger. »

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔没有在意菲斯摩弗瑞斯的熊熊烈火，而是仔细观察着人群。{/n}“这些人聚集在这里，并不是为了赞美神皇的正义，而是为了品尝他人的苦难……就像一群野狗一样，垂涎着新鲜的骨头。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ignoring the raging fire within the Phesmophorius, Argenta studies the crowd.{/n} "All of them came here to taste of other people's pain, not to praise His justice... They are as a pack of dogs slavering for a fresh bone."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔没有在意菲斯摩弗瑞斯的熊熊烈火，而是仔细观察着人群。{/n}“这些人聚集在这里，并不是为了赞美神皇的正义，而是为了品尝他人的苦难……就像一群野狗一样，垂涎着新鲜的骨头。”

languages.text: {n}Ignorando las llamas voraces del Fesmoforio, Argenta estudia a la muchedumbre.{/n} «Todos ellos han acudido aquí para disfrutar del dolor ajeno, no para celebrar Su justicia... Son como una manada de perros babeando por un hueso».
languages.original_text: {n}Ignoring the raging fire within the Phesmophorius, Argenta studies the crowd.{/n} "All of them came here to taste of other people's pain, not to praise His justice... They are as a pack of dogs slavering for a fresh bone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ignorando las llamas voraces del Fesmoforio, Argenta estudia a la muchedumbre.{/n} «Todos ellos han acudido aquí para disfrutar del dolor ajeno, no para celebrar Su justicia... Son como una manada de perros babeando por un hueso».

languages.text: {n}フェスモフォリウス内部の激しい炎を無視して、アルジェンタは群衆を見つめた。{/n}「彼ら全員がここに来たのは、他人の苦しみを味わうためであって、彼の正義を称えるためではない…彼らはまるで、新しい骨に涎を垂らす犬の群れのようだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Ignoring the raging fire within the Phesmophorius, Argenta studies the crowd.{/n} "All of them came here to taste of other people's pain, not to praise His justice... They are as a pack of dogs slavering for a fresh bone."

traits.locale_text: {n}フェスモフォリウス内部の激しい炎を無視して、アルジェンタは群衆を見つめた。{/n}「彼ら全員がここに来たのは、他人の苦しみを味わうためであって、彼の正義を称えるためではない…彼らはまるで、新しい骨に涎を垂らす犬の群れのようだ」

languages.text: {n}Pesmoforyus'un içindeki şiddetli ateşi görmezden gelen Argenta, kalabalığı inceliyor.{/n} "Hepsi buraya başkalarının acısını tatmaya gelmiş, O'nun adaletini övmeye değil... Taze bir kemik için ağzı sulanan bir köpek sürüsü gibiler."
languages.original_text: {n}Ignoring the raging fire within the Phesmophorius, Argenta studies the crowd.{/n} "All of them came here to taste of other people's pain, not to praise His justice... They are as a pack of dogs slavering for a fresh bone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pesmoforyus'un içindeki şiddetli ateşi görmezden gelen Argenta, kalabalığı inceliyor.{/n} "Hepsi buraya başkalarının acısını tatmak için gelmiş, O'nun adaletini övmek için değil... Taze bir kemik için ağzı sulanan bir köpek sürüsü gibiler."
